bib.title: The diffusion of viral content in multi-layered social networks
bib.author: Jankowski, Jaros{\l}aw and Kozielski, Micha{\l} and Filipowski, Wojciech and Michalski, Rados{\l}aw
bib.abstract: Modelling the diffusion of information is one of the key areas related to activity within social networks. In this field, there is recent research associated with the use of community detection algorithms and the analysis of how the structure of communities is affecting the spread of information. The purpose of this article is to examine the mechanisms of diffusion of viral content with particular emphasis on cross community diffusion.
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Computational Collective Intelligence
